title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message:
Hi, got an 820-3787-A that sometimes shuts down on 90% or 6% battery charge. It doesn't shut down instantly, it shuts down like battery is discharged. It doesn't do it on charger. 

Tried 3 different batteries. OEM and Generic. Same issue.
Updated BIOS, no change.
Tried with another motherboard and it worked ok. 

No signs of damage

title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message:
You can try disabling GPU.
Changing the FDMF6808N chips is another option.

Any error pops up, starting in diagnostic mode?

title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message: How can i disable the GPU? I removed  R8900 and  R8901 but now it freezes on startup .

title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message:
820-3787 can be converted from discrete to UMA in the same manner as 820-3332 (2013).

Must force backlight adjust signal, to avoid wake from sleep issue:
- remove R7780 and inject 3V3_S0 to LCD_BKLT_PWM_R.

title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message:
I disabled the GPU and changed  the FDMF6808N  chips but same issue. 

Diagnostics show nothing.

It doesnt shut down in safemode.

title: 820-3787-A shuts down on battery power
message:
Did you test with USB macOS?

Try fresh install on internal SSD too.
